Tavatron:

Tavatron just stared at her mangled sword. She closed her optics for a second then slowly opened them. Then, in a sudden fit of rage she threw her blade to the ground. She watched the dust settle about her sword. 

Tavatron knew that he was angry at her, but why she knew not. Tavatron finally met Dinobot's gaze, and barely controlling the rage that was evident in her voice said with much difficulty:

"A long time ago I allowed a friend of mine to walk into battle. He was damaged, and barely able to stand. And I let him go..."

Tavatron took a deep breath. Then her gaze hardened and in an emotionless voice said:

"He didn't come back." Tavatron turned to go inside the ark:

"I didn't want to lose another friend."
